text: Bernadette Beck (born 1994) is an English actress, entrepreneur, philanthropist, and stunt woman. She was born in Islington, London, England. She is best-known for her role as Peaches 'N Cream on The CW series Riverdale. Beck also appeared on the CW series The Tomorrow People. She is a co-founder and CEO of Smart Choice Brands Incorporated. == References == Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century English actresses Category:21st-century English businesspeople Category:Businesspeople from London Category:English stunt performers Category:English women philanthropists Category:English television actresses Category:Actresses from London Category:People from Islington (district)
title: Bernadette Beck
